message: I have a great product that I think you'll really like. Would you like to make an offer?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $130. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $130. I can do $135, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $125. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle again?
I'm not willing to go as low as $125, but I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet at $137.50?
I'm still not comfortable with $137.50, but I'm willing to go a bit higher. How about $129?

I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can do $142.50, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand your frustration, but I'm not willing to go above $130. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. How about $136?
I'm not willing to go back to $136, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $142.50 and $136. How about $139.25?
I'm not willing to go above $130. I think we're getting close, but I'm not willing to stretch my budget any further. I'll make one final offer: $132. Can you meet me there?
